span.span: Represents a value tuple with 7 components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值元组是具有特定的数量和值序列的数据结构。A value tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 结构表示具有八个或多个元素的值元组。The structure represents a value tuple that has eight or more elements. 值元组类型的区别的元组类型 (如)，如下所示：The value tuple types differ from the tuple types (such as ) as follows: - 它们是结构 （值类型） 而不是类 （引用类型）。They are structures (value types) rather than classes (reference types). - 成员，如和是字段而不是属性。Members such as and are fields rather than properties. - 其字段是可变而不是只读的。Their fields are mutable rather than read-only. 值元组类型提供支持的运行时实现[C# 中的元组](~/docs/csharp/tuples.md)和 F # 中的结构元组。The value tuple types provide the runtime implementation that supports [tuples in C#](~/docs/csharp/tuples.md) and struct tuples in F#. 除了创建实例通过使用语言语法，您可以调用工厂方法。In addition to creating a instance by using language syntax, you can call the factory method. ### 序列化和值的元组Serialization and value tuples 类型不是可序列化在.NET 核心 1.x 或.NET Framework 4.7 和早期版本中。The type is not serializable in .NET Core 1.x or in the .NET Framework 4.7 and earlier versions. 此外，.NET 标准，包括.NET 标准 2.0 中，不强制要求的序列化实例; 是否实例是可序列化取决于单个.NET 标准的实现。In addition, .NET Standard, including .NET Standard 2.0, does not mandate serialization of instances; whether or not a instance is serializable depends on the individual .NET Standard implementation. 若要确定是否类型是可序列化上的特定的.NET 实现，获取对象，表示键入和检索的值其属性。To determine whether a type is serializable on a particular .NET implementation, get a object that represents the type and retrieve the value of its property. 有关.NET 核心和.NET Framework 中的可序列化类型的列表，请参阅[二进制序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/binary-serialization.md)。For a list of serializable types in .NET Core and the .NET Framework, see [Binary Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/binary-serialization.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj`自变量被视为等于当前实例在下列情况下：The `obj` argument is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是值类型。It is a value type. - 其组件是与当前实例相同的类型。Its components are of the same types as those of the current instance. - 其组件是等于当前实例。Its components are equal to those of the current instance. 相等性取决于每个组件的默认相等比较器。Equality is determined by the default equality comparer for each component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过此方法返回的字符串的形式 (*Item1*， *Item2*， *Item3*， *Item4*， *Item5*， *Item6*， *Item7*，其中*Item1*， *Item2*， *Item3*， *Item4*， *Item5*， *Item6*，和*Item7*表示的值， ， ， ， ， ，和字段。The string returned by this method takes the form (*Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*, *Item5*, *Item6*, *Item7*, where *Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*, *Item5*, *Item6*, and *Item7* represent the values of the , , , , , , and fields. 如果任何字段值为`null`，它会表示为。If any of the field values is `null`, it is represented as .
